name: Classic Vegetable Lasagna
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add onion and garlic and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add bell peppers and zucchini and cook until tender-crisp, about 5 minutes more.
Stir in crushed tomatoes, tomato sauce, oregano, basil, salt, and pepper. Bring to a simmer and cook for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
While the sauce is simmering, cook lasagna noodles according to package directions. Drain and set aside.
In a medium bowl, combine ricotta cheese, Parmesan cheese, and egg. Mix well.
To assemble the lasagna, spread a thin layer of sauce in the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish.
Layer with 5 lasagna noodles, half of the ricotta mixture, half of the mozzarella cheese, and half of the remaining sauce.
Repeat layers, ending with the remaining 5 lasagna noodles and sauce. Sprinkle with remaining mozzarella cheese.
Cover with foil and bake for 25 minutes. Remove foil and bake for another 20-25 minutes, or until cheese is melted and bubbly and lasagna is heated through.
Let stand for 10-15 minutes before cutting and serving.
